name: Hero of the Galactic Core
description: Explore the Galactic core with your hero in a real time "Heroes of might and magic" space style RPG game; find upgrades, artifacts, drones, turrets to build base defenses, fight enemy fleets and heroes in fleet combat until you locate the Jump Ship points to engage the enemy base with waves of drones.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8 (8.1), Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 3.00 GHz / AMD CPU 3 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB video card Storage: 74 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8 (8.1), Windows 10 Processor: Intel CPU Core i7 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB video card Storage: 74 MB available space
